# EPAS Starter

> Reference implementation of the Enterprise Platform Architecture Specification (EPAS).

## Quick Start
- Setup: /quickstart.sh
- Docker: /docker-compose.yml

## Architecture
- Gap Analysis: /1.4 Planning/toolcradle-gap-analysis.md
- Current structure:
  - Backend API: /backend/
  - Frontend: /frontend/

## Planned Structure (v1.4)
```
packages/
  api/      # FastAPI service
  sdk/      # Python SDK (new)
  mcp/      # MCP server (new)
  cli/      # CLI tool (new)
  web/      # Next.js frontend
```

## Key Files
- API entry: /backend/app/main.py
- Config: /backend/app/config.py
- Models: /backend/app/models/
- Abstractions: /backend/app/abstractions/

## Abstractions (Good Patterns)
- SecretVault: /backend/app/abstractions/secret_vault.py
- BlobStore: /backend/app/abstractions/blob_store.py
- AuditLogger: /backend/app/abstractions/audit_logger.py

## Frontend
- Entry: /frontend/src/app/
- Components: /frontend/src/components/
- API client: /frontend/src/lib/api.ts

## Agent Context
- Coding rules: /1.4 Planning/CLAUDE.md
- Gap analysis: /1.4 Planning/toolcradle-gap-analysis.md
